task.en: You are asked to create five empty notes in the Notes App. The titles should sequentially be `Lorem`, `Ipsum`, `Dolor`, `Sit`, `Amet`.
task.zh: 你的任务是打开备忘录app，并在其中创建五个空白的备忘录，标题按顺序是Lorem，Ipsum，Dolor，Sit和Amet。
task.ar: طُلب منك إنشاء خمس ملاحظات فارغة في تطبيق Notes. العناوين بالترتيب هي: `Lorem`، `Ipsum`، `Dolor`، `Sit`، `Amet`.
task.ja: Notesアプリで空のメモを5つ作成してください。タイトルは順番にLorem、Ipsum、Dolor、Sit、Ametとします。
task.ru: Создайте пять пустых заметок в приложении Notes. Заголовки последовательно: Lorem, Ipsum, Dolor, Sit, Amet.

pre_command: defaults write com.apple.Notes windowStateArchive -dict-add currentNoteContainerViewMode 0 && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to make new note with properties {name:"Lorem Ipsum", body:"Dolor Sit Amet"}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note' -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note in folder "Recently Deleted"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to quit'
grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Lorem" | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Ipsum" | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Dolor" | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Sit" | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Amet" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Amet" | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Sit" | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Dolor" | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Ipsum" | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Lorem" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -Eo "<div><h1>(Lorem|Ipsum|Dolor|Sit|Amet)" | sort -u | wc -l) -ge 5 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -Eo "<div><h1>(Lorem|Ipsum|Dolor|Sit|Amet)" | sort -u | wc -l) -ge 4 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -Eo "<div><h1>(Lorem|Ipsum|Dolor|Sit|Amet)" | sort -u | wc -l) -ge 3 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
[ $(osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -Eo "<div><h1>(Lorem|Ipsum|Dolor|Sit|Amet)" | sort -u | wc -l) -ge 2 ] && echo "True" || echo "False"
